item.title: IoT Cloud Solution
item.description: IoT cloud solution Cloud services are one of the fastest growing technology sectors. According to Gartner , worldwide cloud services revenue is set to almost double in just four years, from $153 billion in 2017 to $302 billion in 2021. - from arm article AWS Microsoft - Azure Google -

item.title: WizFi360
item.description: WizFi360 WizFi360 Overview WizFi360 is a low cost and low-power consumption industrial-grade WiFi module. It is compatible with IEEE802.11b/g/n standard and supports SoftAP, Station and SoftAP+Station modes. The serial port baud rate can be up to 2Mbps, which can meet the requirement of various applications. Figure: WizFi360-PA(PCB Antena) Figure: WizFi360-CON(U.fl

item.title: WizFi360 - Documents
item.description: WizFi360 - Documents Documents The DataSheet provides a brief introduce about WizFi360. These documents describe the Features,package information and etc. The Program Guide provides the AT Instruction set and AT command examles. The AT Instruction document include the description of AT command and the AT command examples document include TCP/UDP/SSL

item.title: 프론트엔드 기술 조사
item.description: PC, Mobile 환경을 다 지원할 수 있는 아키텍쳐 조사 및 검토 구글에 제공하고 있는 https://flutter.dev/ 리액트 네이티브나 MS 자마린 처럼 cross platform app 개발

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
